title: Scheduler Function Block
description: CDIV dividing two complex numbers X / Y.
name: SCHEDULER_2

input.name: E0
input.description: Event input signal 0 that affects output Q0.

input.name: E1
input.description: Event input signal 1 that affects output Q1.

input.name: E2
input.description: Event input signal 2 that affects output Q2.

input.name: E3
input.description: Event input signal 3 that affects output Q3.

input.name: C0
input.description: Cycle count threshold for input E0.

input.name: C1
input.description: Cycle count threshold for input E1.

input.name: C2
input.description: Cycle count threshold for input E2.

input.name: C3
input.description: Cycle count threshold for input E3.

input.name: O0
input.description: Offset value for input signal E0.

input.name: O1
input.description: Offset value for input signal E1.

input.name: O2
input.description: Offset value for input signal E2.

input.name: O3
input.description: Offset value for input signal E3.

output.name: Q0
output.description: Output signal 0 indicating if the condition for E0 is met.

output.name: Q1
output.description: Output signal 1 indicating if the condition for E1 is met.

output.name: Q2
output.description: Output signal 2 indicating if the condition for E2 is met.

output.name: Q3
output.description: Output signal 3 indicating if the condition for E3 is met.
